songs.title: Falling
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
"My God, are we gonna be like our parents?"
"Not me...ever"
"It's unavoidable, it just happens."
"What happens?"
"When you grow up, your heart dies."
"Who cares?"
"I care."

[Verse 1]
Walking out into the dark
Cutting out a different path
Lead by a beating heart
All the people of the town
Cast their eyes right to the ground
In matters of the heart

[Pre-Chorus]
The night was all you had
You ran into the night from all you had
Found yourself a path up on the ground
You run into the night you can't be found

[Chorus]
This is your heart
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it?
Pumps through your veins
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it?
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh

[Verse 2]
Summer evening breezes blew
Drawing voices deep from you
Lead by a beating heart
What a year and what a night
What terrifying final sights
Put out your beating heart

[Pre-Chorus]
The night was all you had
You ran into the night from all you had
Found yourself a path up on the ground
You run into the night you can't be found

[Chorus]
This is your heart
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it?
Pumps through your veins
Can you feel it?
Can you feel it?
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh

[Outro]
Falling, falling
Falling, falling
Oh, I feel overjoyed
When you listen to my words
I feel them sinking in
Oh, I see them crawling underneath your skin
